Name: Star-Crossed Myth - The Department of Punishments -
About the game: This is a Steam title version of a hit story released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. In Star-Crossed Myth, the heroine encounters beautiful gods of the heavens, each of them marked by sin. In this collection of romantic tales, she heals them of their sins and falls in love. An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy. It all started with a sin... Your love story with the frighteningly beautiful gods of the stars. The Story: Your days are dreamless and mundane until, one night, you notice a star sparkling in the heavens. Suddenly, the beautiful gods of the stars appear before you. Their goal? To erase their sins. This exquisite, heartrending true love…all began with a sin. Characters: God of Libra Zyglavis God of Scorpio Scorpio God of Aries Krioff God of Virgo Partheno God of Gemini Dui God of Pisces Ichthys Contents: Includes 'Main Stories' in the App 'Love 365: Find Your Story'. S1 Prologue Main Story His PoV Epilogue Sequel Sequel His PoV Sequel Epilogue Musings on Love S2 Prologue A Promise of Infinity A Promise of Infinity His PoV Notices: 1) The following characters' 'Musings on Love' are not included. 　Karno, Aigonorus, Krioff, Tauxolouve, Partheno 2) 'A Promise of Infinity: His PoV' is only available in English
